3.Review vaccine storage and handling procedures to ensure proper thawing, an handling.
3.. Wash hands thoroughly before interacting with patients.
3.Request patients to remove any outer garments or blankets to expose the skin where immunizations should occur.
3.Read and provide written or electronic consent according to regulations.

3.Patient education:
Provide detailed information about:
